AZ Business Owners - You're invited to Arizona Business Council's next Educational Conference (FREE) - 5 Ticking Time Bombs in Talent -

Domain Media is an Internet media, publishing and marketing company that connects businesses with enthusiast and community based audiences within specific focused industries. To support this effort, the Company builds and acquires consumer oriented websites, content, and online communities that expand upon its existing network of niche websites within the automotive, health & wellness, financial services, travel, and entertainment industries. The purpose of our network is to bring people together where they can share, learn and have the freedom to express themselves and connect with their like minded peers in online communities that are rich with dynamic content and interaction and provide access to unique resources and information. Domain Media's business services group provides early growth stage to middle market companies with digital media and corporate strategy services that are designed to accelerate company growth in sales, profitability, and operational efficiency with lead generation, market research, search engine marketing, affiliate marketing, corporate strategy planning and competitive analysis.Representative websites on these corporate initiatives include: http://DomainMediaCorp.comhttp://IncredibleCompany.comhttp://ScottsdaleSEOPro.net
Director of Technology & Marketing Group, Board Member

Arizona Business Council is a Not-For-Profit organization where its members and Board volunteer their time and resources for the advancement of Arizona businesses to propel growth, job creation and support the broader business community. In this role, Chris is responsible for creating and managing the new Technology and Marketing Group to represent this growing membership segment within ABC. Additional responsibilities include coordinating and managing all marketing, Internet advertising, website and event marketing initiatives on behalf of the organization.

RadJav is a new decentralized Blockchain Development Platform that enables rapid and secured creation of Smart Contract and DAPPS. RadJav allows developers to create native multiplatform applications quickly and easily with nearly the same look, code, and performance across Windows, Linux*, Mac OSX*, and HTML5. Within the same environment developers can send and receive funds over it's built-in blockchain using XRJ coins (ICO to be announced).

Resourcive is a leading independent telecommunications and cloud services consulting firm, founded in 2001. The Company has established a proprietary strategic process that helps businesses to significantly reduce the expense and complexity of their telecom infrastructure while increasing net income, operational efficiency, and company valuations.As an Enterprise Strategist, I worked with lower middle market to large enterprises and Fortune 500 companies and implement a highly refined and tested process that consistently helps our clients increase their cash flow through telecommunications and data services spend reduction and the optimization of their infrastructure.

Key leader and business strategist for this not-for-profit organization. Arizona Business Council (ABC) was created to assist small business and lower middle market company owners connect with more resources within Arizona to help them align their business strategy with their objectives and optimize their operations to achieve their next level of growth. Lead architect of the Business Catalyst Program  and the Company's business plan and strategy.
Dual Major: Finance & Management Information Systems

Generous, kind and brilliant are three words that come to mind when I think about Chris. Not only is he gifted in the area of business strategy, but he is extremely charitable with his innovative ideas which meld domain expertise with good old fashioned common sense. James J. Jones
Director, Business Development Western US, Telco and Compute Divison
August 25, 2016, Chris worked with James J. but at different companies

I've known James for 10 years and had the pleasure of working with him on an due diligence project for an enterprise storage and high performance computing acquisition while he was with Sanmina.. I was particularly impressed by James’ ability to effortlessly handle very intense moments between executive officers of both companies, and helped bridge differences into solutions and unique ways of working together. He is a true professional and role model that demonstrates the immense value of being prepared, understanding who is on the other side of the table, and being sensitive to a business' needs.  I also have to say that it’s rare to come across someone you can have an intelligent and in depth discussion across a wide range of business, technology, and supply chain topics like James.James is a highly valued asset to any organization seeking an intelligent and thoughtful leader as part of their sales and executive team.

I've known Joe for about 8 years now and there are three things that depict his professionalism and expertise - Focused, Driven, Results. If you have the chance to work with Joe or hire his company to help with cyber security related matters - he's definitely the person you want in your corner.

summary: Chris brings 20-plus years’ combined experience within the technology, financial services and Internet industries.Prior to Domain Media as President and Resourcive as an Enterprise Strategist, Chris managed business development, strategic planning, corporate finance, and merger and acquisition engagements for technology, media, telecom, healthcare, and financial services companies ranging from start-ups to established mid-market and large enterprises. Since 1995, Chris has been highly active with start-ups and growth stage technology companies providing business growth strategy and corporate finance advisory services. Specialties: Strategic Planning, Market Research, Corporate Business Development, Competitive Intelligence and Positioning, Business Assessment and Optimization, Venture Capital, Business Plan Development, Corporate Finance, Mergers & Acquisitions, Due Diligence, Financial Analysis, Marketing Communications, and Digital Media Marketing Strategies.Deep Domain Expertise: Telecommunications, Internet Services, Enterprise Software, Financial Services and Online Media.
